name: Lares Trek And The Lost City Of Machu Picchu.
description: Unlike all popular treks around Cusco, the Lares Trek will truly take you to remote zones, unknown valleys where few visitors have ventured so far. This journey takes you off the beaten track in the Andes, crossing gorgeous lush valleys, passing nice villages where the natives still employ traditional ways of life. A trek to Lares is like going back in time, a different world where Spanish is a second language, and where native still live in harmony with the Mother Nature. On our third day we take a fantastic train journey descending to the cloud forest where is situated one of the wonders of our Planet " The Sanctuary of Machu Picchu". Join us on these great adventure and experience a unique trek in Peru.
